CustomField.formula: IF(AND( ISBLANK(Dismantle_Date_Day_1__c), ISBLANK(Dismantle_Hours_Open_Day_1__c), ISBLANK(Dismantle_Hours_Close_Day_1__c) ), "", IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Dismantle_Date_Day_1__c)), TEXT(MONTH(Dismantle_Date_Day_1__c)) + "/" + TEXT(DAY(Dismantle_Date_Day_1__c)) + "/" +TEXT(YEAR(Dismantle_Date_Day_1__c)) + " ","") + IF(HOUR(Dismantle_Hours_Open_Day_1__c) = 0, TEXT(12), IF(AND(HOUR(Dismantle_Hours_Open_Day_1__c) > 0, HOUR(Dismantle_Hours_Open_Day_1__c) <= 12), TEXT(HOUR(Dismantle_Hours_Open_Day_1__c)), TEXT(HOUR(Dismantle_Hours_Open_Day_1__c) - 12))) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Dismantle_Hours_Open_Day_1__c)), ":" + LPAD(TEXT(MINUTE(Dismantle_Hours_Open_Day_1__c)), 2, '0') + " " + IF(HOUR(Dismantle_Hours_Open_Day_1__c) < 12, "AM", "PM"),"") + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Dismantle_Hours_Close_Day_1__c)), IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Dismantle_Hours_Open_Day_1__c))," - ","") + IF(HOUR(Dismantle_Hours_Close_Day_1__c) = 0, TEXT(12), IF(AND(HOUR(Dismantle_Hours_Close_Day_1__c) > 0, HOUR(Dismantle_Hours_Close_Day_1__c) <= 12), TEXT(HOUR(Dismantle_Hours_Close_Day_1__c)), TEXT(HOUR(Dismantle_Hours_Close_Day_1__c) - 12))) + ":" + LPAD(TEXT(MINUTE(Dismantle_Hours_Close_Day_1__c)), 2, '0') + " " + IF(HOUR(Dismantle_Hours_Close_Day_1__c) < 12, "AM", "PM"),""))
CustomField.label: Dismantle Day1
